instructions: Download TubeMate . TubeMate isn't available from the Google Play Store . Download it as an APK file . Open the app and search for the video you want to download from YouTube. Tap the Download icon. Select the quality of the video you want to download. Tap the red Download icon. Tap the small, white Download icon from the bottom of the app to find the offline video. From there, move it to a new location, extract the audio from the video, rename it, or delete it.
